content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mine at position (16.0, 71.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position (16.0, 71.0)

### Iron Ore Collection Point at position (15.5, 69.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (15.5, 69.5)

### Iron Smelting Facility at position (18.0, 70.0)
Consists of 
- A stone furnace at position (18.0, 70.0)
- A burner inserter at position (16.5, 69.5) that inputs iron ore into the furnace
- A burner inserter at position (19.5, 70.5) that outputs iron plates from the furnace
- An output chest at position (20.5, 70.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Ensure you are within a reasonable distance (max distance is 10) from the target position before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when placing entities next to other entities with insufficient spacing
- Consider increasing the spacing or changing the direction when placing entities next to other entities to avoid collisions with existing entities.

### Errors when inserting items into entities without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.

### Errors when extracting items from entities that do not contain the required item
- Ensure the entity contains the required item before attempting to extract it.

### Errors when extracting items into a blocked destination
- Ensure the destination is not blocked before attempting to extract items into it.

### Errors when connecting transport belts directly to chests
- Use an inserter to transfer items between chests and transport belts.

### Errors when attempting to place entities in occupied positions
- Check if the target position is occupied before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when attempting to extract non-existent items from entities
- Verify that the entity contains the required item before attempting to extract it.

### Errors when output inserter is waiting for space in destination
- Ensure the output chest has enough space to hold the items being extracted.

## NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
